lines: 1. Anywhere with Jesus I can safely go, Anywhere He leads me in this world below; Anywhere without Him, dearest joys would fade; Anywhere with Jesus I am not afraid.
Refrain : Anywhere! anywhere! Fear I cannot know; Anywhere with Jesus I can safely go.
2. Anywhere with Jesus I am not alone; Other friends may fail me, He is still my own; Though His hand may lead me over dreary ways, Anywhere with Jesus is a house of praise.
3. Anywhere with Jesus I can go to sleep, When the gloomy shadows round about me creep, Knowing I shall waken nevermore to roam; Anywhere with Jesus will be home sweet home.
